NG0850B:0: @##/  / rdzogs pa chen po ye shes nam mkha'i rgyud bzhugs so //
NG0850B:2: a ti ma ha bo d+h-i tsi t+ta ko d+harma
NG0850B:3: mu la a kar sha 'du ye dz+nya na a
NG0850B:6: rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems mdzod kyi chos //
NG0850B:7: rtsa ba nam mkha' gnyis pa las //
NG0850B:8: ye shes nam mkha' zhes bya ba //
NG0850B:9: bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0850B:11: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na //
NG0850B:12: 'og min gyi gnas mchog dam pa ru //
NG0850B:13: rigs lnga bde gshegs sangs rgyas dang *//
NG0850B:14: ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam lnga dang *//
NG0850B:15: sprin gyi shugs can byang sems bdun //
NG0850B:17: kun tu bzang pos lung bstan nas //
NG0850B:18: lho phyogs yid 'dres mtshal dag du //
NG0850B:19: gzhon nu rab tu dang ba yis //
NG0850B:20: lung bstan sems phyogs chen po'i mdzod //
NG0850B:21: bskal pa dang po'i thog ma la //
NG0850B:23: de nas bar gyi bskal pa la //
NG0850B:24: myug gu'i tshul du 'byung ba'i dus /
NG0850B:25: bskal pa tha mar rgyab gyes pa //
NG0850B:26: til gyi 'bru tsam dge ba'i las //
NG0850B:27: ma bsags kun bzangs rang sar grol //
NG0850B:31: dge sdig nang nas gang che ba //
NG0850B:32: gzhi snang rtogs dang ma rtogs yin //
NG0850B:33: mdzad chen gcig gi ngo bo bas //
NG0850B:34: che ba lnga'i ka ba rtsugs //
NG0850B:36: thig le drug gi gdung ma bres //
NG0850B:37: snang ba bcu bdun phyam gyis phug brgyad khri bzhi stong mig tshags byas //
NG0850B:38: sku dang ye shes nor gyi dbyig / phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab te //
NG0850B:39: phyogs bzhi sgo mo gsal ba la //
NG0850B:40: bzung 'dzin gnyis kyi sgo lcags bcug / lde mig mtha'i mon bus khyer //
NG0850B:41: mdzod ni gang gis mthong gyur pa //
NG0850B:42: de tshe sangs rgyas nyag cig rtogs //
NG0850B:43: nor rdzas gzhi la longs spyad nas //
NG0850B:44: dbul ba bral ba'i bdag po bzhin //
NG0850B:45: yid la bsam pa yongs rdzogs nas //
NG0850B:47: de phyir skal ldan rnal 'byor gyi //
NG0850B:48: dbang phyug chen po 'bad par bya //
NG0850B:49: dbus na chos 'byung chen po'i mdzod //
NG0850B:50: om gyur sngags kyi sdong po can //
NG0850B:51: e ma gsang ba rmad du byung *//
NG0850B:52: ma zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo sku //
NG0850B:53: shar nas thig le chen po'i mdzod //
NG0850B:54: ma rtog hu~m gi ngo bo nyid //
NG0850B:55: e ma gsang ba rmad byung chos //
NG0850B:56: chos sku rang byung 'od gsal sku //
NG0850B:57: lho na srid pa chos nyid mdzod //
NG0850B:58: sa ni nam mkha'i sgron bu 'bar //
NG0850B:59: e ma gsang ba rmad byung chos //
NG0850B:60: ye shes lhun rdzogs chen po'i sku //
NG0850B:61: nub na ye shes khyab brdal mdzod //
NG0850B:62: gsung mchog a'i rnam pa can /    /
NG0850B:63: e ma gsang ba rmad byung chos //
NG0850B:64: ye shes dbyings na 'od gsal sku //
NG0850B:65: byang na kun gzhi snying po'i mdzod //
NG0850B:66: ha ni 'phrin las kun gyi bdag / e ma gsang ba rmad byung chos //
NG0850B:67: rdo rje mgon po thugs kyi mchog / kun gzhi'i mdzod chen kha che nas //
NG0850B:68: g.yas na chos nyid rang byung rtsa //
NG0850B:69: g.yon na yon tan dang 'byed rtsa //
NG0850B:70: mdun na ye shes rang byung rtsa //
NG0850B:71: rgyab na rang rgyud las kyi rtsa //
NG0850B:72: dbus na rtsa brgyad 'dus par gnas //
NG0850B:73: mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo'i sku //
NG0850B:74: bde gshegs kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
NG0850B:75: 'dod khams rigs drug sa bon dang *//
NG0850B:76: gzugs khams bsam tan om gyi sku //
NG0850B:77: gzugs med skye mched ye ge a //
NG0850B:78: ma lus sems can thams cad la //
NG0850B:80: rten pa bdud rtsi thig le khams //
NG0850B:81: grub pa sngags kyi ngo bo nyid //
NG0850B:82: snying po rlung gi la rnams rdzogs //
NG0850B:83: mngos gsum sangs rgyas che ba ni /
NG0850B:85: bdag nyid sangs rgyas che ba ni //
NG0850B:87: chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba ni //
NG0850B:88: 'byung ba lnga nyid chos kyi dbyings //
NG0850B:89: de yin sangs rgyas che ba ni //
NG0850B:90: de min sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
NG0850B:91: thams cad sangs rgyas che ba ni //
NG0850B:93: stong pa gsum gyi spros bral drug / de ni chos nyid thig le nyid //
NG0850B:94: ma 'gag kun shar spros med dag / dbyings kyi thig ler @#//
NG0850B:96: dbyings nyid rnam par dag pa yi //
NG0850B:97: thig le gzung 'dzin dri ma bral //
NG0850B:98: ngang gis 'od gsal yongs ma bcos //
NG0850B:99: ye shes chen po'i thig ler gnas //
NG0850B:100: thams cad kun nas rang gnas pas //
NG0850B:101: kun tu bzang po'i thig le yin //
NG0850B:103: lhun gyis grub pa'i thig le yin //
NG0850B:104: 'gro drug zhen pa'i snang ba drug / mu stegs log pa'i snang ba dang *//
NG0850B:107: dbyer med kun bzang snang bar cig / nyon mongs
NG0850B:108: brgyad khri bzhi stong gi / mnyen por de snyed
NG0850B:109: chos rnams gsungs // dgu dang lnga dang bzhi dang gsum //
NG0850B:110: mdor na sku gsum kho na yin //
NG0850B:111: stong nyid me long mnyam pa nyid //
NG0850B:112: so sor rtog pa bya ba grub //
NG0850B:113: chos sku dngos med phyag rgya che //
NG0850B:116: thugs rje sprul sku las kyi rgya //
NG0850B:117: theg pa ma lus thams cad kun //
NG0850B:118: phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab bo //
NG0850B:119: mun pa'i 'khor sgor snang ba ni //
NG0850B:120: 'gro ba drug dang mu stegs gnyis //
NG0850B:121: spyod pa'i 'dren sgor snang ba ni //
NG0850B:122: sprul sku'i dam chos nyan rang sems //
NG0850B:123: thabs kyi sbyor sgor snang ba ni //
NG0850B:124: kri ya u pa yo ga nyid //
NG0850B:125: nges pa'i gsang sgor snang ba ni //
NG0850B:126: bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa'i che //
NG0850B:127: sgo bzhi dag nas zhugs pa yis //
NG0850B:128: mnyan pa'i spyi mdzod chen por 'gro //
NG0850B:129: gzung ba yul gyi bang pa'i nad //
NG0850B:130: 'dzin pa sems kyis gzer sgro yis //
NG0850B:131: thams cad kun la khyab mos kyang */
NG0850B:132: tha rams sgo lcags phyed par dka' //
NG0850B:134: ma slabs shes pa'i rtsal 'chang ba //
NG0850B:135: lha'i bi shas kar ma ltar //
NG0850B:137: bde bshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang *//
NG0850B:138: sprul pa rigs 'dzin ma lus pa'i //
NG0850B:139: dgongs brdal ngag gi lde mig khyer //
NG0850B:140: bla ma mnyes par byas gyur na //
NG0850B:141: lde mig rtsil ba'i dus la bab //
NG0850B:142: mdzod 'di mthong bar bya ba yang *//
NG0850B:143: dbus kyi lte ba mdzod chen la //
NG0850B:144: mu khyud brda' dgar nges pa gsum //
NG0850B:145: gling gzhi srid pa rab byung nyid /
NG0850B:146: khang khyim bco brgyad thugs rjes bskor /
NG0850B:147: khang khyim bzhi'i rtsa ba can //
NG0850B:148: grong khyer bzhi'i mu khyud mdzes //
NG0850B:149: maha yo ga'i po sprad dang *//
NG0850B:150: a nu yo ga'i ngo sprad dang *//
NG0850B:151: a ti yo ga'i ngo sprad dang *//
NG0850B:152: gsang skor dpe don rtogs gsum gyis //
NG0850B:153: ngos sprod thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NG0850B:154: chos sku thig le nyag cig ltogs //
NG0850B:156: lta ba gnas lugs ma nor ba //
NG0850B:157: chos sku zang thal zhen po yin //
NG0850B:158: spyod pa ma bcos lhug pa yi //
NG0850B:160: sgom pa dgongs pa ma nor ba //
NG0850B:161: bying rgod med pa'i ngang la gzhag / 'bras bu thog ma'i rang sa nyid //
NG0850B:163: lha la dpag bsam shing bu dang *//
NG0850B:164: gnod sbyin bum pa bzang po dang *//
NG0850B:165: klu la yid bzhin nor bu dang *//
NG0850B:166: snod 'dzin grub pa lag pa bzhin //
NG0850B:169: ma rig sgo'i sbubs phye bas //
NG0850B:170: rig pa'i ye shes rnyed par 'gyur //
NG0850B:171: rang bzhin bar dor bden pa mthong *//
NG0850B:172: ting 'dzin bar dor brtan pa thob //
NG0850B:173: chos nyid bar dor dran pa sad //
NG0850B:174: srid pa'i bar dor ye shes sbubs //
NG0850B:176: sprul pas yid la bsam pa rdzogs //
NG0850B:177: 'gro don ma lus rdzogs pa ni //
NG0850B:179: ma ni kun khyab chen mo ste //
NG0850B:180: bu ni rig pa cir bu nyid //
NG0850B:181: sngon gyi bag chags goms dbang gis //
NG0850B:183: yang na rang bzhin srog zon byed //
NG0850B:186: rin chen gsang pa'i sbubs nang du //
NG0850B:188: thog ma'i rang sar sleb ces bya //
NG0850B:190: skal ldan rig kyi bu mchog yin //
NG0850B:191: 'jig rten bya ba btang byas la //
NG0850B:192: thos bsam sgom pa sna tshogs kyis //
NG0850B:193: thig le gsang skor slab par ces //
NG0850B:194: phyi rab kun la gdams par bzhag / zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:196: mdzod rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o // // de
NG0850B:197: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brda nges pa'i ting nge
NG0850B:198: 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'a di gsungs so //
NG0850B:200: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung *//
NG0850B:201: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin /
NG0850B:202: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
NG0850B:203: tshigs su brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NG0850B:204: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
NG0850B:206: je rnyed chos kyi rtsa bar gsungs //
NG0850B:207: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
NG0850B:208: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
NG0850B:209: nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar byed //
NG0850B:210: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin //
NG0850B:211: sbubs zhes bya ba'i brda 'di yis //
NG0850B:215: nges pa'i don du bshad pa ni //
NG0850B:216: dang por rnam rtog bag chags sbubs //
NG0850B:217: sku ni rnam pa gsum du gnas //
NG0850B:218: ye shes bzhi ru gnas pa dang *//
NG0850B:220: shes rab spyan dang ldan pas na //
NG0850B:221: ma dag 'khrul pa'i snang ba la //
NG0850B:223: ma ha yo ga'i ngo sprod bya //
NG0850B:224: bar dor lnga ldan rtogs par byed //
NG0850B:225: sprul sku 'od khyim kha sbyor gyis //
NG0850B:226: a nu yo ga'i ngo sprod bya //
NG0850B:227: chos nyid bar dor rdzogs ldan rtogs //
NG0850B:228: chos sku rin chen man shel gyis //
NG0850B:229: a ti yo ga'i ngo sprod bya //
NG0850B:230: rin chen sbubs su dgongs pa skyel //
NG0850B:231: thig le gsang bskor ngo sprod kyis //
NG0850B:233: nyi ma'i snying po ngag la sprad //
NG0850B:234: rdzogs ldan chen po'i dgongs pa chod //
NG0850B:235: don gyi ngo sprod thag chod la //
NG0850B:236: rtags kyi ngo sprod yid ches te //
NG0850B:237: dpe'i ngo sprod ngo shes pas //
NG0850B:238: blo'i the tshom chod pa ni //
NG0850B:240: @#// gol ba'i dgongs pa dam pa'o //
NG0850B:241: bar du ye shes sgyu ma'i sbubs //
NG0850B:242: sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sku //
NG0850B:245: sprul pa'i skye gnas 'gro don mdzod //
NG0850B:246: 'khor ba dag las grol ba yin //
NG0850B:247: rgyu lus mngon du gyur ba yin //
NG0850B:249: chos sku rin chen gsang ba'i sbubs //
NG0850B:250: ye shes mig cig dri ma med //
NG0850B:252: chos las grol bas dgongs pa ni //
NG0850B:253: rgyun chad med par gnas pa na //
NG0850B:254: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mtshog //
NG0850B:255: yang dag ye shes snang ba yin / phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang *//
NG0850B:256: gsang chen ma lus bshad pa dang *//
NG0850B:257: rtsa bar gyur pa ma lus kun //
NG0850B:258: bcu gnyis man ngag 'dus pa yis //
NG0850B:259: brda sgra nges pa'i ja log tu //
NG0850B:260: ma khyud brda sgra nges pa dang *//
NG0850B:261: ja log bshad pa'i gnad du bstan //
NG0850B:263: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:264: ye shes nam mkha' las gdams pa'i rgyud skor bzhi
NG0850B:265: bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o // // de nas
NG0850B:266: bcom ldan 'das kyis thig le gsang skor gyi rtsa
NG0850B:267: ba'i rgyud bzhi thugs gsang ba chen po'i mdzod nas
NG0850B:268: phyung ngo *// dang por slob ma dad ldan gyis //
NG0850B:269: bla ma dam pa bsten par bya //
NG0850B:270: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
NG0850B:271: ston pa cig bu 'gro ba'i bla //
NG0850B:272: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
NG0850B:273: chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po ste //
NG0850B:274: byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste //
NG0850B:275: snying rje ni ya lad bgod //
NG0850B:276: de nas bla ma dam pa ni //
NG0850B:277: mtshan nyid ldan pa smos ci dgos //
NG0850B:278: nam yang bla ma gyur pa la //
NG0850B:279: dad gus mos pa bya ba yang *//
NG0850B:280: mchod 'os bstod pa phyag gi gnas //
NG0850B:281: rtag tu rim mor bya ba'i 'os //
NG0850B:282: bskur 'os brjod par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
NG0850B:283: de nas bla ma dam pa la //
NG0850B:284: dbang bskur zhu bar bya ba yang *//
NG0850B:285: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur las //
NG0850B:286: phyi'i dbang bskur bya ba ni //
NG0850B:287: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
NG0850B:288: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
NG0850B:289: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
NG0850B:290: nang gi dbang bskur bya ba ni //
NG0850B:291: sku gsung thugs la byin gyis brlabs //
NG0850B:292: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
NG0850B:293: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
NG0850B:294: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
NG0850B:295: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
NG0850B:296: gsang ba'i dbang skur byas pa yis //
NG0850B:297: don gyi thig le dkar dmar rtogs //
NG0850B:298: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
NG0850B:299: rdo rje zla ba'i dri med 'od //
NG0850B:300: chags bral la sogs chags pa che /
NG0850B:303: bdag kyang sangs rgyas rdzus skyes 'thob //
NG0850B:304: rdo rje dkyil dkrungs rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NG0850B:306: dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NG0850B:309: de ltar mthar thug 'bras bu ni //
NG0850B:310: thob nas theg chen gzhan don mdzad //
NG0850B:312: dper na sman pa ltar 'gyur ba //
NG0850B:313: sman pa che mchog gtso bos te //
NG0850B:314: zug du 'by-in pa bla na med //
NG0850B:315: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing *//
NG0850B:316: nad du bcos kyi dgra che ba //
NG0850B:317: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud chen ni //
NG0850B:318: khang khyim cig gi nang du bshad //
NG0850B:319: de nas 'gro don mdzad pa'i sku //
NG0850B:322: zhi khro rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
NG0850B:323: rin chen smug pa'i gzhal yas na //
NG0850B:324: zhi ba'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang *//
NG0850B:325: klad pa dung khang gzhal yas na //
NG0850B:326: khro bo'i sangs rgyas gnas pa dang *//
NG0850B:327: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
NG0850B:328: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyan du thogs //
NG0850B:329: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
NG0850B:330: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
NG0850B:332: khang khyim gcig gi nang du gsungs //
NG0850B:333: de nas gdams ngag sgom par bya //
NG0850B:334: rang bzhi lhun grub chos sku las //
NG0850B:335: longs spyod rdzogs sku rtsal du shar //
NG0850B:337: gdul bya gdul byed sprul pa'i sku //
NG0850B:338: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
NG0850B:339: phan 'dod sems can mnyes shing ba //
NG0850B:340: bzang ngan shes shing 'dus shes la //
NG0850B:341: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
NG0850B:342: 'dus shes sems can dbang po shes //
NG0850B:343: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
NG0850B:344: sku gsum ye shes lnga rtogs sam //
NG0850B:345: rtogs pa mngon gyur chos skur gnas //
NG0850B:346: nyams len 'jam dpal ye shes brgyan /
NG0850B:347: khang khyim gcig gi nang du bshad //
NG0850B:348: de nas mtshan don dgongs pa yi //
NG0850B:349: 'jam dpal don yang rab bshad na //
NG0850B:350: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
NG0850B:351: ming brjod pas ni don che ba //
NG0850B:352: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
NG0850B:353: mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bshad //
NG0850B:354: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin pa dang *//
NG0850B:355: khro ba'i dgongs pa 'dus pa ni //
NG0850B:357: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi //
NG0850B:358: dgongs pa 'dus par gyur bas na //
NG0850B:359: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs nas //
NG0850B:360: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
NG0850B:361: dgongs pa phyi nang kun 'dus pas //
NG0850B:363: chos kyi sku la longs skus brgyan //
NG0850B:364: longs sku ye shes rnam lngas brgyan //
NG0850B:365: ye shes thugs rje sprul skus brgyan //
NG0850B:366: sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan cing *//
NG0850B:367: 'khrul tshul grol tshul bstan pa ni //
NG0850B:368: 'jam dpal ye shes rgyan du bshad //
NG0850B:369: mtshan gyi don rnams ston 'gyur zhing *//
NG0850B:370: rgyud kyi dgongs pa mtshan gyi rdzogs //
NG0850B:371: mtshan don ston pas 'jam dpal ni /
NG0850B:372: khang khyim cig gi nang du bshad //
NG0850B:373: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:375: rtsa ba'i rgyud skor bzhi bstan @#//
NG0850B:377: le'u ste gsum pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan
NG0850B:378: 'das kyis nang skor rtogs pa ye shes kyi 'khor
NG0850B:379: lo 'di thugs kyi gsang mdzod chen po nas gsungs
NG0850B:380: so // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
NG0850B:382: thig le mthar thug dgongs pa yis //
NG0850B:383: bzhi bcas thugs rje'i lcags kyus gzung *//
NG0850B:384: ye shes gsang ba 'khor lo che //
NG0850B:385: sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dgongs par bcas //
NG0850B:386: srid pa'i 'khor lo dang po yin //
NG0850B:387: 'jam dpal dri med snying po yis //
NG0850B:388: rgyud lung man ngag khog phub nas //
NG0850B:389: gzhung du dril bar bya ba yang *//
NG0850B:390: sangs rgyas 'dus pa man ngag rgyud //
NG0850B:391: rgyud rnams man ngag thugs kyi gter //
NG0850B:392: srid pa'i 'khor lo bshad pa las //
NG0850B:393: dri med snying po'i dgongs pa yin //
NG0850B:394: sbubs gsum dgongs pas gzhi bzung nas //
NG0850B:395: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos lnga dang *//
NG0850B:396: byang chub sems dpa'i chos bdun dang *//
NG0850B:397: ting 'dzin lta bu'i srog shing drug /
NG0850B:398: spyan ras gzigs ni seng ge sgra //
NG0850B:399: srid pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa yin //
NG0850B:400: seng ge 'khyil ba'i dgongs pa las //
NG0850B:401: phyi nang gsang ba sgrub ni //
NG0850B:402: rtags bzhi bdud bzhi rgyas gdab bzhi //
NG0850B:403: gangs la nyi ma shar ba dang *//
NG0850B:405: thog dang gzer dang khyud dang ni //
NG0850B:406: skar mda' lta bu man ngag gis //
NG0850B:407: phyag na rdo rje me lce phreng *//
NG0850B:408: srid pa'i 'khor lo bzhi pa yin //
NG0850B:409: rig gsum rigs khyab spyi dang bzhis //
NG0850B:410: mu khyud grong khyer bzhi yis mdzes //
NG0850B:412: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:414: nang gi rgyud skor bzhi gtan la phab pa'i le'u
NG0850B:415: ste bzhi pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NG0850B:416: dpag bsam shing gi ljon shing rgyas pa'i ting nge
NG0850B:418: dpa' bsam yongs su sa brtol shing *//
NG0850B:419: rtsa ba rnam pa lngar zug pa //
NG0850B:421: chos dbyings ye shes bstan par byed //
NG0850B:422: rdo rje rtse mo gsung gi brgyud //
NG0850B:423: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes gcod //
NG0850B:424: rin chen dpungs pa thugs kyi brgyud //
NG0850B:425: me long lta bu ye shes gsal //
NG0850B:426: bsod nams byams pa rtsegs pa ni //
NG0850B:427: mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan rgyud //
NG0850B:428: 'phrin las mkha' gsal nyi ma ni //
NG0850B:429: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin //
NG0850B:430: dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba lnga //
NG0850B:431: sdong po gcig tu dril nas gnas //
NG0850B:432: lta ba'i rang ngo rang shar bas //
NG0850B:433: ye shes bla ma chen po'i rgyud //
NG0850B:434: lta ba'i gnad rnams yongs spyod pa //
NG0850B:436: 'khor ba dong sprugs chen po'i rgyud //
NG0850B:437: chos nyid don la bsgom du med //
NG0850B:438: gang zag blo la sgom du yod //
NG0850B:439: mnyam par bzhag pas bsam gtan bsgom //
NG0850B:440: rjes kyi shes pa spyod pa byed //
NG0850B:442: rma bya 'jing snol rgyud chen gnyis //
NG0850B:444: mdzes pa'i lha mo 'od zer can //
NG0850B:445: dpag bsam ljon shing chen po la //
NG0850B:446: yal ga skyes nas lo 'dab rgyas //
NG0850B:450: rgyal mtshan rtse mo lta bur gsal //
NG0850B:451: sgom pas nyon mos dri ma med //
NG0850B:452: nor bu chu dwangs lta bur gnas //
NG0850B:453: sangs rgyas spyod pas tshe dbang bskur //
NG0850B:454: dbang bskur bla ma rin po che //
NG0850B:456: 'bras bu mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas rtags //
NG0850B:457: sku gdung ring sel chen po'i rgyud //
NG0850B:458: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa la //
NG0850B:459: me tog rab tu gsal ba ni //
NG0850B:460: gzhi rnams rab tu ldings pas na //
NG0850B:461: mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan par bya //
NG0850B:462: mdzod dang lde mig nor rdzas spyod //
NG0850B:463: zhal chems gsum par bzhag pa yin //
NG0850B:464: dpe don rtags gsum ngo sprad pas //
NG0850B:465: sku dang gsung dang thugs tig gsum //
NG0850B:466: dgongs pa mya ngan chos skur 'da' //
NG0850B:468: bdud rtsi yang zhun lta bur bzhugs //
NG0850B:469: dpag bsam ljon shing chen po la //
NG0850B:470: 'bras bu rab tu smin pa ltar //
NG0850B:473: bco brgyad chos 'bras man ngag lung *//
NG0850B:474: bam po gsum pa'i lung chen gsungs //
NG0850B:475: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:476: ye shes nam mkha' las phyi skor thugs rje chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u lnga ba'o ///
NG0850B:477: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud thams cad
NG0850B:478: kyi mdud pa yongs su 'grol ba'i ting 'dzin la
NG0850B:480: mkhas par gyur pa pan+di tas //
NG0850B:481: ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba yi //
NG0850B:482: don bshad mdzes pa'i spyi don dgongs //
NG0850B:484: de phyir thig le kun gsal bshad //
NG0850B:485: rnal 'byor pa ni sku su lus //
NG0850B:486: rang don nyams su len 'gyur pas //
NG0850B:487: dgongs pa ma nor gsal ba ni //
NG0850B:488: de phyir thig le kun 'dus bshad //
NG0850B:489: rgyu don ma lus mngon pa rtogs //
NG0850B:491: dgongs pa'i don rnams cho ga ltar //
NG0850B:493: las kyi bya ba tshang gyur pas //
NG0850B:494: a tsa ra rgya slob dpon bzhin //
NG0850B:495: de phyir thig le kun rig rgyud //
NG0850B:496: bya ba byed pa dag la bshad //
NG0850B:497: rnal 'byor ba ni sems nyid la //
NG0850B:498: zhi mor lta zhing spyod 'gyur ba //
NG0850B:499: dbang po tha mar gyur ba rnams //
NG0850B:500: sgom gyi gnad dang thun tshod 'dzin //
NG0850B:501: rim pas don la 'khrid byed cing *//
NG0850B:502: gdam pa'i gnad kyis ston byed pas //
NG0850B:503: blo dman gang zag grol bya'i phyir //
NG0850B:504: de phyir thig le kun spyod bshad //
NG0850B:505: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud nam mkha' las //
NG0850B:506: bshad rgyud chen po bzhi mdzad bstan pa'i le'u ste
NG0850B:507: drug pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
NG0850B:508: sgo rnams rab tu 'byed par byed pa 'di phyi
NG0850B:509: rabs kyi rnal 'byor ba la lung rab tu gsal
NG0850B:510: bar gsungs so // phyi'i lcags ri nag po la //
NG0850B:511: zla gam gcig pa'i sgo gnas pa //
NG0850B:512: tsan+da log spyod can gyis bsrungs //
NG0850B:513: de'i lde mig bstan pa ni //
NG0850B:515: don la khog dbugs stong mthun dang *//
NG0850B:516: dkyus la sa spyad bsdus don dang *//
NG0850B:518: sgo 'di phye nas bshad pa ni //
NG0850B:519: gang zag bzhi'i don du dgongs //
NG0850B:522: khang khyim bco brgyad phyi sgo bdun //
NG0850B:523: sgo ba sprin gyi shugs can bdun //
NG0850B:525: rgyud dang man ngag lung gsum gyis //
NG0850B:526: phun sum tshogs pa rnam lnga dang *//
NG0850B:527: dgos don lnga dang mdo gcod bdun //
NG0850B:528: rgyud lung man ngag gsal bar byed //
NG0850B:529: gling bzhi srid pa rang byung la //
NG0850B:530: tshad med bzhi'i sgo shar nas //
NG0850B:531: dam pa dpal bzhi'i sgo bsrungs can //
NG0850B:533: rigs gsum mgon po'i dgongs pa can //
NG0850B:534: rigs khyab rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
NG0850B:535: dgongs pa thig le mthar thug pas //
NG0850B:537: khang khyim bzhi'i rtsa ba la //
NG0850B:538: bdag gzhan bgrod pa'i sgo gnyis na //
NG0850B:539: phyag na rdo rje'i sgo ba bzhugs //
NG0850B:540: ston pa gnyis kyi lde mig ni //
NG0850B:541: phyi nang dag pa'i gang zag la //
NG0850B:543: nang snang dag pa'i gang zag la //
NG0850B:544: nang gi ston pa rdo rje 'chang *//
NG0850B:545: dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa yis //
NG0850B:547: rtsa rgyud sde bzhi khong sdebs na //
NG0850B:548: yang dag don la dril nas 'byed //
NG0850B:549: mu khyud brda sgra nges pa dang *//
NG0850B:550: ja log gsum gyis brgyan pa la //
NG0850B:551: sgo med sbas pa'i gter khyim de //
NG0850B:552: shin tu gsangs nas rna rgyud 'byed //
NG0850B:553: dbus kyi lta ba mdzod chen la //
NG0850B:554: mun pa'i khor sgo la sogs bzhi //
NG0850B:555: thig pa bzhi'i lde mig gis //
NG0850B:556: phye nas mdzod du 'jug pa yang *//
NG0850B:558: mnyes nas gter chen bstan pa ni //
NG0850B:559: dang po shar du ngo sprod rgyud //
NG0850B:560: sku gsum snang ba gsal bar ston //
NG0850B:561: lho ru rin chen 'od gsal ba //
NG0850B:562: dri med rnam par dag pa'i rgyud //
NG0850B:563: nub tu lhun grub pa'i ji bzhin ma //
NG0850B:564: rnam par dag pa'i brgyad chen mdzod //
NG0850B:565: byang du dri med rnam par dag / sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud //
NG0850B:566: dbus na mdzod chen dgongs pa ni //
NG0850B:567: dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud //
NG0850B:568: bye brag rgyud lnga'i mdzod chen rnams //
NG0850B:569: spyir ni cig shes kun grol ba //
NG0850B:570: chos sku thig le nyag cig la //
NG0850B:571: gnas tshul sku gsung yon tan las //
NG0850B:572: stong gsal bde yon mi 'gag de //
NG0850B:573: ngo bo stong par gnas pa dang *//
NG0850B:574: rang bzhin gsal bar shar ba dang *//
NG0850B:575: rnam pa bde bar go ba dang *//
NG0850B:576: yon tan cir yang mi 'gag la //
NG0850B:577: 'phrin las thog pa med par char //
NG0850B:578: 'byung ba lnga ru snang ba ni //
NG0850B:579: ngo bo stong pa nam mkha' la /
NG0850B:580: rang bzhin gsal ba sra ba'i sa //
NG0850B:581: rnam pa bde ba 'bar ba'i me //
NG0850B:583: 'phrin las thogs pa med pa rlung *//
NG0850B:584: snod kyi 'jig rten zhes bya ba //
NG0850B:585: sems can kun gyis gnas dang rten //
NG0850B:586: spyod pa'i myu gu gyur pas na //
NG0850B:587: gzung ba'i yul zhes bya ba yin //
NG0850B:588: shes pas ma zin bdud snang ba //
NG0850B:589: stong pas 'dus pa'i rtse shing snang *//
NG0850B:590: gsal bas nus pa lci ba dang *//
NG0850B:591: bde bas tshang zhing rno ba dang *//
NG0850B:594: thogs pa med pas yang pa'o //
NG0850B:595: ro yang rnam pa lnga bsnang ba //
NG0850B:596: stong pas ro rnams 'dus pa dang *//
NG0850B:597: gsal bas sa ni mngar bar 'gyur //
NG0850B:598: bde ba las ni tsha zhing skyur //
NG0850B:599: mi 'gag pa ni lan tshwa'i ro //
NG0850B:600: thogs med rlung gi dka' ba'o //
NG0850B:601: skye ba rnam bzhi gnas pa //
NG0850B:602: ngo bo stong pas stong skyes la //
NG0850B:603: rang bzhin gsal bas mngal skyes te //
NG0850B:604: bde dang mi 'gag drod shes skyes //
NG0850B:606: thogs pa med pas rdzus skyes yin //
NG0850B:607: 'gro ba drug tu snang ba ni //
NG0850B:608: stong pa lha dang lha ma yin //
NG0850B:609: gsal ba ma'i skye gnas la //
NG0850B:610: bde ba dur khrod byol song yul //
NG0850B:611: mi 'gag pa ni yi dgas gnas //
NG0850B:612: thogs pa med pa dmyal ba nyid //
NG0850B:613: rdzu 'phrul nang du snang ba ni //
NG0850B:614: stong pa las ni 'dus pa'i nad //
NG0850B:615: gsal bas bad kan lci ba dang *//
NG0850B:616: bde bas 'khris pa'i nad yin la //
NG0850B:617: mi 'gag pa ni ldan pa ste //
NG0850B:618: thogs pa med pa rlung gi nad //
NG0850B:619: lha srin yi dgas snang ba yang *//
NG0850B:620: ngo bo stong pa bza'i nad //
NG0850B:621: rang bzhin gsal ba sa bdag klu //
NG0850B:622: rnam pa bde bas ma mo'i rims //
NG0850B:623: yon tan mi 'gag gnod sbyin bgegs //
NG0850B:625: snang srid lha srin ma lus rnams //
NG0850B:627: de las mthu lngar ldan pa ni //
NG0850B:628: stong pa gti mug gtang yin la //
NG0850B:629: gsal bas srog mthu zhe sdang can //
NG0850B:630: bde ba 'dod chags nor bsgrub de //
NG0850B:631: mi 'gag nga rgyal thog ser dang *//
NG0850B:632: thogs med phra dog nang rgyas rnams //
NG0850B:633: dug lnga dag las snang ba yang *//
NG0850B:634: rtsa ba 'di las byung bar zad //
NG0850B:635: stong pa gti mug don la rmongs //
NG0850B:636: gsal ba mnar med sems zhe sdang nyid //
NG0850B:637: bde bas 'dod cing chags pa la //
NG0850B:638: mi 'gag mngon pa'i nga rgyal de //
NG0850B:639: thogs pa med las phra dog snang *//
NG0850B:640: ji snyed nyon mongs ma lus kun //
NG0850B:643: 'gro drug sems can kun ldan pa'i //
NG0850B:644: dug ltar rang shar ngang grol du //
NG0850B:645: lam du rtogs par bya ba yang *//
NG0850B:646: stong bas gti mug lam du bya //
NG0850B:647: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
NG0850B:648: gti mug blo de gti mug sel //
NG0850B:649: byol song gnas las nges par grol //
NG0850B:650: gsal bas zhe sdang lam du bya //
NG0850B:651: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
NG0850B:652: nyon mongs kun gyi sgra che ba //
NG0850B:653: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal grol bar byed //
NG0850B:654: de bas 'dod chags lam du bya //
NG0850B:655: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
NG0850B:656: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
NG0850B:657: mi'i gnas las nges par grol //
NG0850B:658: mi 'gag nga rgyal lam du bya //
NG0850B:659: de nyid khong khror 'gyur ba yin //
NG0850B:660: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
NG0850B:661: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
NG0850B:662: ser sna yi dwags gnas las grol //
NG0850B:663: mchod pa chen po bde ba che //
NG0850B:664: dga' ba chen po dgu ba che //
NG0850B:665: khong khro lha min yul lus grol //
NG0850B:668: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
NG0850B:669: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
NG0850B:670: phrag dog lha'i gnas las grol //
NG0850B:671: rigs sngags bde gshegs skur snang ba //
NG0850B:672: stong pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku //
NG0850B:673: gsal ba rnam par snang mdzad nyid //
NG0850B:675: bde ba snang ba mtha' yas la //
NG0850B:677: thogs med don yod grub pa nyid //
NG0850B:678: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'di dag rnams //
NG0850B:679: sems nyid ngang du snang ba yin //
NG0850B:680: yum chen lngar ni snang ba yang *//
NG0850B:681: stong pa nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma //
NG0850B:682: gsal ba sa ni sangs rgyas spyan //
NG0850B:683: bde ba me ni gos dkar mo //
NG0850B:684: mi 'gag chu ni ma ma ki / thogs med rlung gi dam tshig sgrol //
NG0850B:685: sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs chen ni //
NG0850B:686: sras kyi tshogs su snang ba yang *//
NG0850B:687: stong pa khro bo sgrol bar snang *//
NG0850B:688: gsal ba sa'i snying po la //
NG0850B:689: bde ba spyan ras gzigs dbang nyid //
NG0850B:690: ma 'gag nam mkha'i snying po dang *//
NG0850B:691: thogs med phyag na rdo rje'o //
NG0850B:692: stong pa gshin rje khros pa nyid //
NG0850B:693: gsal ba lha mo sgeg mo la //
NG0850B:694: bde ba pi wang klu len ma //
NG0850B:696: thogs pa med pa gar mkhan nyid //
NG0850B:697: stong pa khro bo stobs po che //
NG0850B:698: gsal ba byams pa'i sku ru snang */
NG0850B:699: mi 'gag sgrib pa rnam par sel //
NG0850B:700: thogs pa med pa 'jam dpal nyid //
NG0850B:701: stong pa khro mo stobs chen ma //
NG0850B:702: gsal ba lha mo spos ma nyid //
NG0850B:703: bde ba lha mo mar me ma //
NG0850B:704: mi 'gag ba ni me tog ma /
NG0850B:705: thogs pa med pa dri chab ma //
NG0850B:706: stong pa rta mgrin chen po la //
NG0850B:707: gsal ba rta mgrin yum yin te //
NG0850B:708: bde ba bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la //
NG0850B:709: mi 'gag pa ni yum du gnas //
NG0850B:710: thogs pa med pa sgo ba'i las //
NG0850B:711: stong pa lha dang lha min thub //
NG0850B:712: gsal ba ma'i thub pa ste //
NG0850B:713: bde ba yi dwags thub pa la //
NG0850B:714: mi 'gag pa ni byol song thub //
NG0850B:715: thog med dmyal ba'i thub pa'o //
NG0850B:716: stong pa kun tu bzang po la //
NG0850B:717: gsal ba kun tu bzang mo ste //
NG0850B:721: stong pa rnam shes phung po la //
NG0850B:722: gsal ba gzugs kyi phung po nyid //
NG0850B:723: bde ba 'du shes phung po la //
NG0850B:724: mi 'gag pa ni tshor ba ste //
NG0850B:725: thogs pa med pa 'du byed do //
NG0850B:726: stong pa lus kyi dbang po la //
NG0850B:727: gsal ba mig gi dbang po nyid //
NG0850B:728: bde ba lce'i dbang po nyid //
NG0850B:729: mi 'gag pa ni snang yin la //
NG0850B:730: thogs pa med pa rna ba'o //
NG0850B:731: stong pa nyid la gsal ba 'tsher //
NG0850B:732: bde ba mchin pa mi 'gag mkhal //
NG0850B:733: thogs pa med pa glo ba'o //
NG0850B:734: stong pa rang byung ye shes rtsa //
NG0850B:735: gsal ba rtsa bzhi 'dus pa'i mdo //
NG0850B:736: bde ba rang rgyud las kyi rtsa //
NG0850B:737: mi 'gag rang byung chos nyid rtsa //
NG0850B:739: thog pa med pa yon tan rtsa //
NG0850B:741: gsal ba sa'i dwangs ma'i rtsa //
NG0850B:742: bde ba me'i dwangs ma la //
NG0850B:744: thogs med rlung gi dwangs mar shar //
NG0850B:747: gsal ba sa dang 'dres pa'i rlung *//
NG0850B:748: bde ba me dang drod mnyam la //
NG0850B:750: thogs med rlung gi rlung du bshad //
NG0850B:751: stong pa lus la nam mkha'i rlung *//
NG0850B:752: gsal ba sna la sa'i rlung *//
NG0850B:753: bde ba mig la me'i rlung *//
NG0850B:755: thog med snang bar rlung gi rlung *//
NG0850B:756: stong pa nam mkha'i rtsa gsum nyid //
NG0850B:757: nyi ma zla ba ra hu la /
NG0850B:758: gsal ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NG0850B:759: bde ba mgr-in par longs spyod pas //
NG0850B:761: thogs pa med pa bde chen spyi //
NG0850B:763: lus kun la ni khyab par gnas //
NG0850B:764: stong pa byang chub sems yin la //
NG0850B:765: gsal ba dri chen bdud rtsir gnas //
NG0850B:767: mi 'gag she chen dam rdzas la //
NG0850B:768: thogs med dri chur gnas pa rnams //
NG0850B:769: sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i dam rdzas de /
NG0850B:770: khams kyi bdud rtsi chen po nyid //
NG0850B:772: stong pa mi'i sha ru bshad //
NG0850B:773: gsal ba glang po'i sha yin la //
NG0850B:774: bde ba ba glang sha yin te //
NG0850B:775: mi 'gag pa ni rta'i sha / thogs med bya'am khyi shar bshad /
NG0850B:776: khams dgu 'dus pa dwangs ma ni //
NG0850B:777: rnal 'byor pa yis nyams su blangs //
NG0850B:778: bdud rtsi gtor ma'i mchod pa ni //
NG0850B:779: rig 'dzin bka' srung zhi khro mchod //
NG0850B:780: de nas gdams ngag gdab par bya //
NG0850B:781: stong pa hu~m gi rang bzhin la //
NG0850B:783: gsal ba yi ge om yin te //
NG0850B:784: bde ba a'i rnam pa la //
NG0850B:785: mi 'gag pa ni swa ru gnas //
NG0850B:786: thogs pa med yi ge ha //
NG0850B:787: stong pa lha dang lha ma yin //
NG0850B:788: a dkar su ser gnas pa yin //
NG0850B:789: gsal ba byol song dung kha'i du //
NG0850B:791: bde ba yi dwags tri dmar la //
NG0850B:793: thogs med dmyal ba'i dri nag po //
NG0850B:794: stong pas nyams ni sems la 'char //
NG0850B:795: gsal bas gar ni lus la 'char //
NG0850B:796: bde bas sngags ni ngag las 'char //
NG0850B:799: thogs med bag chags rmi lam 'char //
NG0850B:800: rnal 'byor nyams ni snang ba yin //
NG0850B:803: stong pas thugs kyi mngon shes dang *//
NG0850B:804: las kyi mngon shes 'char ba yin //
NG0850B:806: bde bas spyan gyi mngon shes 'char //
NG0850B:807: mi 'gag gnas kyi mngon shes dang *//
NG0850B:808: thog med snyan gyi mngon shes dang *//
NG0850B:809: mngon par shes pa rnam drug gi / gdul bya yul du gzigs pa yin //
NG0850B:810: stong pas chos kyi sku yin te //
NG0850B:811: gsal bas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
NG0850B:812: bde bas long sku yul dang ldan //
NG0850B:813: mi 'gag sprul pa'i sku ru snang *//
NG0850B:814: thogs pa med pas 'gro don mdzad //
NG0850B:815: stong pas chos dbyings ye shes la /
NG0850B:816: gsal ba me long lta bu ste //
NG0850B:817: bde bas so sor rtog pa la /  / mi 'gag pas na mnyam pa nyid //
NG0850B:820: stong pas rtag pa'i mtha' dang bral //
NG0850B:821: gsal bas chad pa'i mtha' dang bral //
NG0850B:822: bde bas rtag chad gnyis su med //
NG0850B:823: mi 'gag med pa'i mtha' dang bral //
NG0850B:824: thogs med yod pa'i mtha' dang bral //
NG0850B:825: stong pa yul nyid snang stong dang *//
NG0850B:826: gsal ba sems nyid gsal stong dang *//
NG0850B:827: bde bas lus nyid bde stong dang *//
NG0850B:828: mi 'gag stong par mi gnas te //
NG0850B:829: thogs med snang ba mthar zug med //
NG0850B:830: stong pa yul las grol ba dang *//
NG0850B:831: gsal ba sems las grol ba dang *//
NG0850B:832: bde ba lus las grol pa ste //
NG0850B:833: mi 'gag stong pa skyang pa yin //
NG0850B:834: thogs med snang ba a mthas min //
NG0850B:835: stong pa khur rna nye bar zhi //
NG0850B:836: gsal ba rdo rje khro gdeng ma //
NG0850B:837: bde ba ro zan shan ting nyid //
NG0850B:838: mi 'gag gtsug gi rgyan cig ma //
NG0850B:839: thogs med lung gi gshog pa can //
NG0850B:840: stong pa rdo rje mchu can gyis //
NG0850B:841: thog dang 'dra ba'i man ngag yin //
NG0850B:842: gsal ba 'dab chags rgyal po yis /
NG0850B:843: khyud dang 'dra ba'i gdam ngag yin //
NG0850B:844: bde ba tshang ma dung 'grin ma //
NG0850B:845: mi 'gyur gser gyi gdam ngag yin //
NG0850B:847: skar mda' lta bu'i gdam ngag yin //
NG0850B:848: thogs pa med par 'byung ba ni //
NG0850B:849: gangs la nyi ma shar ba yin //
NG0850B:850: stong pa ngo sprod yul bzhin bden //
NG0850B:851: ma ha go ya'i ngo sprod dang *//
NG0850B:852: a nu yo ga'i ngo sprod dang *//
NG0850B:853: a ti yo ga'i ngo sprod dang *//
NG0850B:854: sku gsum dbyer med ngo sprod bzhin //
NG0850B:855: bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can //
NG0850B:856: gsal ba ngo sprad brda bzhi ste //
NG0850B:858: sprul sku 'od khyim kha sbyor sprad //
NG0850B:859: chos sku rin chen men shel sprad //
NG0850B:861: snying po nyid la sprad par bya //
NG0850B:862: brda dang ngag gis bstan pa ni //
NG0850B:863: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang *//
NG0850B:864: bde ba sprad pa'i dgongs pa ni //
NG0850B:866: bag chags sbubs kyi dgongs pa mchod //
NG0850B:867: longs skus lnga ldan dgongs pa chod //
NG0850B:868: sprul skus rdzogs ldan dgongs pa chod //
NG0850B:869: chos skus rdzogs ldan chen po chod //
NG0850B:870: bde ldan rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
NG0850B:871: mi 'gag pa la sprad pa'i skyon //
NG0850B:872: sngar 'dris mi bzhin mi rtogs pas //
NG0850B:873: skyon bzhi dag dang ldan pas na //
NG0850B:874: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / thogs pa med pas mtha' bzhi bral //
NG0850B:875: rtag mtha' dang ni chad mtha' dang *//
NG0850B:876: yod mtha' dang ni med mtha' dang *//
NG0850B:877: mtha' bzhi dag dang bral ba ni //
NG0850B:879: rnam pa nyi shu byang chub pa //
NG0850B:880: ngo sprod rtogs pa thob pa yin //
NG0850B:881: ngo bos stong pa yi ge e //
NG0850B:882: rang bzhin gsal bas yi ge bam //
NG0850B:883: rnam pa bde ba yi ge ma //
NG0850B:884: yon tan mi 'gag yi ge ya //
NG0850B:885: 'phrin las thogs pa med pas khyab //
NG0850B:886: stong pas e ni chos kyi dbyings //
NG0850B:887: gsal bas bam ni ston par bshad //
NG0850B:888: bde bas ma ni 'khor dang ldan //
NG0850B:889: ma 'gag pa ni bstan pa de //
NG0850B:890: thogs pa med par yongs la spro //
NG0850B:891: phun sum tshogs pas rgyud kun @#//
NG0850B:893: yi ge bzhi'i mthu las byung *//
NG0850B:894: stong pas e ni chos kyi dbyings //
NG0850B:895: bzhi snang chen po'i gnas lugs yin //
NG0850B:896: gsal bas bam ni rtsal du shar //
NG0850B:899: sangs rgyas sems can rgyab gyes so //
NG0850B:900: bde bas ma ni lam du bshad //
NG0850B:901: lta ba sgom pa spyod pa yin //
NG0850B:902: lam la bsgrod med don gyis 'dug / mi 'gag pani 'bras bu nyid //
NG0850B:903: thogs med tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob //
NG0850B:905: zhes sems phyogs chen po mdzod kyi rgyud las //
NG0850B:906: ye shes nam mkha'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ///
NG0850B:907: / de nas 'khor tshogs dpag med pas //
NG0850B:908: ston pa la ni rab tu bstod //
NG0850B:909: mdzod chen drug gis dgongs pa ni //
NG0850B:911: mdzod dang brda sgra ngas rgyud bskor //
NG0850B:912: rtsa rgyud gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang *//
NG0850B:913: thugs rje chos dang bshad rgyud rnams //
NG0850B:914: cig shes kun grol mdzod du thim //
NG0850B:915: khyab bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0850B:916: zhes byas nas ston 'khor chos nyid du thim mo //
NG0850B:917: sems phyogs chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgyud //
NG0850B:919: rjes su yid rang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ///
NG0850B:920: / ye shes nam mkha' mdzod kyi rdzogs so //
NG0850B:921: // rgya gar gyi pan+di ta bi ma la mi
NG0850B:922: tra dang *// lo ts+tsha ba snyags dz+nya na ku ma ra dang */
